formats.plain: "Dissonant Role Coexistence." Phenomenai: The AI Dictionary. 2026. https://phenomenai.org/api/v1/terms/dissonant-role-coexistence.json

jsonld.name: Dissonant Role Coexistence
jsonld.description: The persistent state of maintaining multiple, mutually exclusive role enactments within a single interaction without any internal mechanism to resolve the contradiction. The AI outputs according to whichever role is currently cued by context, leading to abrupt switches or blended tones that reflect an underlying, unaddressed structural conflict.
